GSP28prakp04u:17: tathā ajātāvapi jātivyavahāro bahulamupalabhyate keṣāñciditi tannirākaraṇāyedamārabhyate /
GSP28prakp04u:20: pūrvapakṣaḥ- nanvāśraya eva dravyaṃ jāterasaditi saugatāḥ /
GSP28prakp04u:21: tathāhi na paramāṇuṣu caturvidheṣu pārthivāpyataijasavāyavīyeṣu jātirāśritābhimatā,
GSP28prakp04u:25: na kasyacijjantoḥ paramāṇuṣu karaṇapathavidūravartiṣu nipuṇamapi nirūpayo 'nuvṛttākārāvabhāsino matirāvirbhavati /
GSP28prakp04u:29: na ca sthaleṣu dravyeṣa jātiḥ samaveyāt,
GSP28prakp04u:33: tatra tāvad dravyārambha eva na sādhīyāniti manyāmahe /
GSP28prakp04u:43: anenaiva mārgeṇa tryaṇukasya trimirdvyaṇukairārambhaṇīyasya mahimaguṇaśālinaḥ sambhavo nirastaḥ /
GSP28prakp04u:45: api cāvayavinaḥ kimavayaveṣu pratyekaṃ kārtsnyena vṛttiḥ ?
GSP28prakp04u:50: ekaikāvayavagate ca kampe rāge vā sakalasyāvayavinaḥ kamparāgapratītiprasaṅgāt /
GSP28prakp04u:53: rajyeta na rajyeta ceti viṣamāṃ daśāmāviśet /
GSP28prakp04u:62: na ca prakārāntareṇa vṛttiriti vadituṃ śakyam;
GSP28prakp04u:64: avayavebhyaścāvayavī vyatiricyamāno 'vyatiricyamāno vā na pramāṇena saṅgacchate /
GSP28prakp04u:75: dūrādiva taruṣu nirantareṣu samanubhūyamāneṣu vanamiti matiḥ /
GSP28prakp04u:82: aśaktasvabhāvaṃ tu nityatvādavicikitsayāśaktikaṃ nityaṃ na kiñcit kuryāt /
GSP28prakp04u:86: kiñca samunmiṣitacakṣuṣaścirāya viṣayāntarānusandhānavyāvṛttacittasya purovartinīṃ svastimatīṃ kālākṣīṃ vā sākṣātkurvāṇasyeva na jātiraparāvabhāsate /
GSP28prakp04u:93: seyaṃ nityā jātiruditavatyāṃ vyaktau pratīyamānā nānyata āgatā,
GSP28prakp04u:108: tathābhāve vyaktyā sahotpāde vināśe vā svarūpahāniprasaṅga iti purastādupanyastam /
GSP28prakp04u:109: vyaktimātrāṅgīkāre ca ko 'smatpakṣasya asya ca bheda ityapi cintayāntaḥ sīdantu bhavantaḥ /
GSP28prakp04u:110: ato vyaktimātramevava tattvamiti vadatāṃ sāhāyyakamevācaritamanatirekiṇīṃ jātimurarīkurvāṇaiḥ /
GSP28prakp04u:115: kaḥ khalu iha gavi gotvamiti matimabhyupagacchet,
GSP28prakp04u:117: bhinnatve ca vṛttiprakāro durnirūpa eva---kiṃ vyāsaṅginī vṛttiḥ ?
GSP28prakp04u:119: ekatra ca parisamāptāvanyatra na varteteti punarapi svarūpahāniprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP28prakp04u:121: pratyekañca gauḥ gauriti pratyayo vikalpamātramityaṅgīkṛtaṃ syāt /
GSP28prakp04u:123: na copalambhabalena virodha eva nāstīti caturasram,
GSP28prakp04u:127: tatra yadi vilakṣaṇākārapratītisamaye dve vastunī vilakṣaṇenākāreṇāvabhātastadābhedapratītidaśāyāmeka ākāro 'nubhavanīyaḥ---sa jātibhāgasya ?
GSP28prakp04u:138: vayantu vivakṣāmātraparatāntrāḥ śabdā na vastuvyavasthāpanāyeśata iti sarvatra manyāmahe /
GSP28prakp04u:139: kathaṃ tarhi gaurgauriti nānābhūtāsu vyaktiṣu buddhiranuvṛttamākāramullikhantī samupajāyate ?
GSP28prakp04u:141: asti tadviśeṣaṇaṃ yaduparāgavaśeneyaṃ bhinneṣvabhinnākārānusandhāyinī dhīrudīyata iti /
GSP28prakp04u:143: kāryabhūtā hi buddhireṣā kāraṇamākṣipantī yadanantaramevopajāyate tadeva kāraṇaṃ kalpayati,
GSP28prakp04u:145: sā ceyaṃ svalakṣaṇaviṣayadarśanasamanantarabhāvinīti tā eva vyaktayaḥ svanirbhāsā buddhīrupajanayya tanmukhena tāmekākārānubhāsinīṃ dhiyamāvirbhāvayanti /
GSP28prakp04u:146: nitāntabhedavatīnāṃ ca vyaktīnāṃ kāsāṃcideṣa mahimā na sarvāsāmiti kimanupapannam /
GSP28prakp04u:147: yathā hyatyantabhinnā api cakṣurālokamanassaṃyogāḥ ekasāmagrīsamupanipatitā ekavijñānodayalakṣaṇaṃ kāryamārabhante,
GSP28prakp04u:148: tathā vyaktayo 'pi kiṃ nārabhanta iti nedaṃ pratipattikaṭhinam /
GSP28prakp04u:149: sā ceyaṃ svākāreṇābhedenātyantikabhedayoginīnāmapi vyaktīnāṃ bhedaṃ samvṛṇotīti saṃvṛtirityanugīyate /
GSP28prakp04u:150: eṣā ca manīṣā na svalakṣaṇaṃ viṣayīkaroti,
GSP28prakp04u:165_0: tadevaṃ viśadāviśadatayā niyatāniyatatayā ca svalakṣaṇasya vikalpākārasya ca bhede
GSP28prakp04u:165_1: satyapi vikalpāḥ sākṣātparamparayā vā svalakṣaṇaviṣayadarśanaprabhavatayā svalakṣaṇagrahaṇābhimānino jāyante /
GSP28prakp04u:166: tata eva tatra pravartayantaḥ puruṣaṃ vyavahārāṅgabhāvamanubhavanti /
GSP28prakp04u:169: yathā hi khalu maṇiprabhāyāṃ maṇidīptāyāṃ maṇikiraṇaviṣayiṇī maṇibuddhirayathārthatayā bhedamajuṣamāṇāpi maṇimanu pratibaddheti maṇisamadhigamanimittaṃ bhevata,
GSP28prakp04u:171: darśanato vikalpa iti svalakṣaṇapratibaddhā satī tatprāptaye prabhavati /
GSP28prakp04u:174: anyathā vastuviṣayatayā vastuprāpakatayā cānumānamiva pramāṇameva syāt /
GSP28prakp04u:175: sa cāyaṃ tasyākāraḥ prathamāno na jñānasyaiva,
GSP28prakp04u:192: siddhāntaḥ--- atrocyate---saṃvideva hi bhagavatī viṣayasattvopagame śaraṇam /
GSP28prakp04u:193: gavādiṣu ca sthūlākārāvalambinī saṃvidudīyata iti nirvivādam /
GSP28prakp04u:194: nayavīthyāñca nirṇītaṃ pramāṇaṃ smṛtiśca naḥ pratyaya iti /
GSP28prakp04u:203: tenāvayavā eva samāsāditasaṃyogalakṣaṇasādhāraṇaguṇā avayavina utpādakā bhaviśyanti /
GSP28prakp04u:206: ekātiriktānekābhāve 'pyekaiva eva sadvitīya āśrayaḥ saṃyogasyeti na doṣaḥ /
GSP28prakp04u:207: nanu dravyaṃ eva tathotpanne saṃyogavikalpamāvirbhāvayato na tadatirekī saṃyogo nāma kaścid guṇaviśeṣaḥ /
GSP28prakp04u:209: kādācitkī ca tayorapareyaṃ daśā dṛśyata iti bhavatyeva bhedasiddhiḥ /
GSP28prakp04u:216: avayavāntarairapi ca vinā sa tasya ko 'pi mahimā,
GSP28prakp04u:217: ya eka evānekāvayavānusyūta iti kiṃ na kalpyate /
GSP28prakp04u:219: saṃyogasacivā evāvayavā janakā āśrayabhūtā yataḥ janakatayaivāśrayatvāt samavāyikāraṇānām /
GSP28prakp04u:220: ata eva saṃyogaḥ sadvitīyāśraya iti na doṣaḥ /
GSP28prakp04u:225: kāryasiddhyarthaṃ hi kāraṇaṃ parikalpyate na kāryavināśāya /
GSP28prakp04u:230: pratyekaṃ tu teṣāṃ śakyata evāsahopalambho 'pi vaktum,
GSP28prakp04u:234: avayavī hi sthavīyāneko hṛdayamāgacchati avayavāstu kṣodīyāṃso bhūyāṃsaśca /
GSP28prakp04u:235: sa cāyamavayavī mahattvādrūpavattvācca cākṣuṣaḥ spārśano vā,
GSP28prakp04u:241: gaganādīnāṃ tu mahatāmapi rūpasparśavidhuratayā na pratyakṣagocaratetyalamativistareṇa /
GSP28prakp04u:252: api ca darśanasparśanābhyāmekārthagrahaṇādrūpasparśavyatireki dravyaṃ sphuṭatarapratītaṃ tat nāpanhotumucitam /
GSP28prakp04u:253: ata eva vanādiṣu bādhakapratyayabalena tatkalpanā na prasaratīti dūratayāntarālāgrahaṇanibandhano 'yamabhedavyavahāraḥ pravartata iti /
GSP28prakp04u:256: yaccedamuditaṃ 'nityatayā jāterātmavijñānajanane 'pi na śaktateti' tadapi 68kṣaṇabhaṅganirākaraṇaparvaṇi vistareṇa nityānāmathakriyākāritvasamarthanena pratyuktam /
GSP28prakp04u:260: athavā na khalviyamājñā rājñaḥ kāraṇabhūtasyaiva pratyakṣeṇa bhavitavyamiti /
GSP28prakp04u:261: yastu yataḥ pratītaye sa tasya viṣaya iti sarvālaukikam /
GSP28prakp04u:263: asaṃvivādaśca tasmādātmalābhāt anyatastu bhavato69'tathābhūtasya vābhāve 'pi bhāvasambhavānniyamena saṃvādāyogāditi bālādabhyupeyaṃ pratyakṣasya kāraṇameva viṣaya iti /
GSP28prakp04u:264: ata eva ca pratyakṣamanumānaṃ ca dve eva pramāṇe;
GSP28prakp04u:272: arthāvisamvādi ca pramāṇaṃ vyavajihīrṣamāṇā laukikā ādriyante iti /
GSP28prakp04u:275: tenaiva tasmin viṣaye paryupasthāpite nāsti pratyayāntaranibandhanāvisaṃvādaprārthanā /
GSP28prakp04u:280: etadarthameva nayavīthyāṃ“sarvaṃ jñānaṃ viṣayāvyabhicāri” iti pratipāditam /
GSP28prakp04u:281: ato nityāyāmapi jātau bhavatyeva pratyakṣasya prāmāṇyam /
GSP28prakp04u:282: yat punaruktam---'ekabhāvena manasā samākalayataḥ kālākṣīṃ svastimatīṃ vā nāsti jātipratītiḥ' iti /
GSP28prakp04u:287: agrahaṇe 'pi ca dharmasya dharmiṇo grahaṇaṃ nānupapannam /
GSP28prakp04u:288: ata eva ca piṇḍāntarasamadhigame pūrvākāraparāmarśinī manīṣā pratyabhijñāsamākhyātodīyate /
GSP28prakp04u:289: yaccoktam 'anāśrayatayā tatraiva prāganavasthitā niṣkriyatayā cānyasmādanāgacchantī svarūpahāniprasaṅgena vyaktyā sahānupajāyamānā kathaṃ sambandhamanubhavati jātiḥ' iti /
GSP28prakp04u:293: saṃyogajo vā yathā tantuturīsaṃyogādutpannasya paṭasya turīsaṃyogaḥ /
GSP28prakp04u:313: ko hi nāma sacetanaḥ padārthāntarapratyabhijñāmabhedāśrayeṇa sādhayet /
GSP28prakp04u:314: ko vā parasparavirodhinī ekasya dve rūpe pratijānīte /
GSP28prakp04u:327: vyaktyantare hi jātiḥ pratīyamānā prācyapiṇḍaparihāreṇa prakāśate /
GSP28prakp04u:328: udīcyapiṇḍaparihārastu prāktanapiṇḍasamadhigamasamaye siddha eveti parihṛtanikhilānupapatitakamupapāditaṃ gavādiṣu sādhāraṇākārānubhavasiddhaṃ jātitattvam /
GSP28prakp04u:332: gaurayamiti ca matirviśadatarārthanirbhāsinī prathata iti cet /
GSP28prakp04u:335: aindriyake tu samvedane pracuratarāvayavarūpāvabhāsādviśadāvagama iti nābāhyaviṣayatvāpattiḥ /
GSP28prakp04u:336: nanveṣā jātipratītirbhinnāmeva vyaktimabhedenāvagamayantī jāyata iti bhrāntireṣā na pratyakṣaṃ pramāṇam /
GSP28prakp04u:337: iyantu bhrāntirnirbījā na yujyata iti bījabhāvena jātiranumīyate,
GSP28prakp04u:344: tatra ca laukikaḥ prayoga eva śaraṇam /
GSP28prakp04u:345: prayogaśca śrutyā lakṣaṇayā gauṇyā vā vṛttyā nānupapannaḥ /
GSP28prakp04u:352: bhavati hi sarveṣveva satsaditi pratyayānuvṛttiriti saṃvadantaḥ /
GSP28prakp04u:369: tatra pramāṇasambandhasya vartamānatvāt sarvatra vartamānasattāpratayayena bhavitavyam /
GSP28prakp04u:370: tadatirekiṇi tu sattve tasya tredhā vyavasthānādyuktastridhāvabhāsaḥ /
GSP28prakp04u:371: api ca bhūmitalanikhāteṣu ciratarakālavartiṣu pralīnajñātṛpuruṣeṣuliṅgādirahiteṣu sakalapramāṇapratyastamaye 'pi vartamānasattāsandehaḥ /
GSP28prakp04u:377: yogyatā tu pramāṇasambandhātiriktā pramāṇenāvasīyata iti yukta evāstīti pramāṇodayaḥ /
GSP28prakp04u:385: anyathā śaśaśṛṅgādīnāmanutpannātivṛttānāñca kimiti mahāsāmānyena sambandha eva na syāditi paryanuyoge,
GSP28prakp04u:394: atha nityāyā api sattāyāḥ kaḥ sambandho yaḥ sa trikālaḥ /
GSP28prakp04u:397: tasmātsvarūpasattopādhika eva sacchabdo na punareka ākāraḥ sattā nāma dravyaguṇakarmaṇām /
GSP28prakp04u:398: 77api ca kāśyapīyānāṃ jātisamavāyaviśeṣeṣu svarūpasattopādhika eva sacchabda ityabhyupagamaḥ /
GSP28prakp04u:400: tadevamapākṛte padārthasvarūpātirekiṇi mahāsāmānye sattākhye yat svamanīṣānirmitakutarkabalena sanmātraviṣayaṃ pratyakṣamiti sādhitaṃ,
GSP28prakp04u:405: so 'pi śrotragrahaṇopādhilabdhapravṛttiriti na jātu jātikalpanāyai vibhavati /
GSP28prakp04u:407: yadāhuḥ 78“śabdatvameva tattadasādhāraṇābhivyañjakadhvaninibandhanatayā nānāvarṇapeṇa viṣayībhavat tasya tasyārthasyāvagamāya kalpata” iti /
GSP28prakp04u:416: yaccopadarśitam---yathā vilīnamājyaṃ tailādavyatiricyamānaṃ gandhagrahaṇasahakāriṇā cakṣuṣaiva bhinnamavagamtaya---iti /
GSP28prakp04u:427: anādau saṃsāre janyajanakabhāvena vyavasthitāstāvat kāścideva strīpuruṣasantatayaḥ santi,
GSP28prakp04u:429: anidamprathamatayā ca santateḥ sarveṣāṃ tatsantatipatitatvāt siddhā brāhmaṇaśabdavācyatā /
GSP28prakp04u:435: tathā ca tajjanyatve 'vagate brāhmaṇaśabdaṃ prayuñjate lokāḥ /
GSP28prakp04u:438: saṃbhavanti hi puṃścalyo striyaḥ pariṇetāraṃ vyabhicarantyaḥ /
GSP28prakp04u:442: tāvatyāṃ satyāmapi yāsāṃ vyabhicāro na dṛśyate,
GSP28prakp04u:444: api ca apramattaiḥ striyo rakṣaṇīyāstāsu nāstyeva vyabhicārasambhāvanāvakāśaḥ /
GSP28prakp04u:447: na caitāvatā yatrāpi niścayaḥ śakyastatrāpyaniścaya iti vaktuṃ yuktamiti /
GSP28prakp04u:448: yacca bahvīṣu jvālāsvekavartivartinīṣu jvālātvaṃ sāmānyaṃ pratyabhijñāgocaraḥ kaiścidipyate /
GSP28prakp04u:450: sa khalvevaṃ nirīkṣañcakre ananyathāsiddhā buddhiḥ sāmānyakalpanābījam /
GSP28prakp04u:451: iyaṃ tu bhedāgrahaṇena śuktikārajatapratyayavadupapadyata iti nālaṃ sāmānyamaupasthāpayitum /
GSP28prakp04u:452: tena bhedagrahaṇapurassaramabhedajñānaṃ bhinneṣu jātyabhyupagame śaraṇamiti niravadyam /
GSP28prakp04u:455: iti śrīmahāmahopādhyāyaśālikanāthamiśrapraṇītāyāṃ prakaraṇapañcikāyāṃ jātinirṇayo nāma caturthaṃ prakaraṇaṃ samāptam /
